title: Hunger Untamed

Sworn to rid the world of evil, consumed by sorcery and seduction, their wild natures are primed for release.For a thousand years she has haunted him... Ariana, Queen of the linas, a beauty of mist and light. His love, his life mate... author: Pamela Palmer
